item.title: Ok how i add npc say online or offline
item.dc:creator: @Roderick50 Roderick50
item.description:
@Roderick50 wrote:

fear reaper is 3649…
so go to autospawn.cfg

fill in:

spawn = 3649	3242	3430	0	0	0	0	0	2	Fear Reaper

explained
first the monster id.
start spot, the 0s is were to move, 0 means dont move… u can do other coords so he walks.
do ::coordson, and ull see the coords… always do 2… thats what i learned.
at end the name, so u know if u wanna change.
between the numbers to tab.
but when its = monster id, then between those a space! farther always tab.
good luck i go play soccer now, hope i helped u a bit

Read full topic

item.description:
@Roderick50 wrote:

u dont need the code ::npc, u need npc ID and stuff…
look up, i posted code all writen in CAPS LOCK, so like that, big letters.
that is what u need to replace with whatever u want
good luck.

item.title: Ok how i add npc say online or offline
item.dc:creator: @Roderick50 Roderick50
item.description:
@Roderick50 wrote:

if (npcs[i].npcType == PASTE HERE UR NPC ID) {
if (misc.random2(25) <= 3) {
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn(“PASTE HERE UR NAME”)){
npcs[i].textUpdate = “OWNER … IS ONLINE”;
}
else{
npcs[i].textUpdate = “OWNER … IS OFFLINE”;
}
}
}

change big letters to whatever u want… credits to the other section of moparscape backup files of 1-2 years old
its in npchandler by the way. press cntl+F then moo, and paste this under it

Read full topic

item.title: Ok how i add npc say online or offline
item.dc:creator: @cccrrraaazzziii cccrrraaazzziii
item.description:
@cccrrraaazzziii wrote:

If you have the code it should be ok for it to say your online/offline. Rather than spawning, try using a current NPC used on your current server. Simply go into your client, hit Ctrl+F, search for a phrase an NPC is saying, and enter the code there.

Read full topic
